page.title: 16LIFE IN THE POLICE FORCE
page.content: Mr.Eke is a policeman in North Shields. In the force(covering from Berwick to Sunderland)there are 9 divisions.In those 9 divisions there are 3 special- ist divisions: A:Headquarters B:Traffic C:Operations Mr.Eke is at present in the Operations Division,part of which is called Marine Division.This covers the rivers Tyne, Wearand the coast from Sunderland to Berwick.This division includes an under water search-unit(divers).It works in conjunction with the lifeboat service and the Royal Navy.Their work includes mines stowaways and dead bodies found in water. He sometimes works on night shift and has to deal with glue sniffers,drunks and burglaries.To be a policeman means training for at least 14 weeks.
